official_title: Recognizing the 40th anniversary of the Cumbres and Toltec Scenic Railroad.

summary.text: Recognizes the Cumbres & Toltec Scenic Railroad (C&TSRR) days. Acknowledges the critical role of freight and passenger rail in our nation's intermodal transportation system. Commends efforts of the state governments of Colorado and New Mexico, the C&TSRR Commission, the C&TSRR Management Company, and Friends of the C&TSRR for their efforts to maintain this historic and scenic railroad.

titles.title: Recognizing the 40th anniversary of the Cumbres and Toltec Scenic Railroad.
